properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Home is the sailor, home from the docks Bringing home the groceries, and the smell of tar

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Why does the sailor smell of tar, he doesn't drink the bloody stuff? Life is full of mysteries, and this is one

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: The sailor is a worried man like everybody else Bringing in the washing, and the smell of tar

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: When does the sailor sail his boat, we never see him doing it? Life is full of mysteries, and this is two

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Gone is the sailor, gone to the pub Ordering a bag of crisps, and a tot of rum

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Why does the sailor order a bag of crisps, his shaky fingers cannot tear it open I've sung about the sailor, and now I'm done

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Except to sing Why does the sailor smell of tar, he doesn't drink the bloody stuff....
